SELECT i.institute_name AS instituteName, b.declare_name AS declareName, b.declare_type AS declareGroupType, a.* FROM innovate_declare_attach AS a left join innovate_declare_info AS b on a.declare_id = b.declare_id LEFT JOIN innovate_sys_institute AS i on i.institute_id = b.institute_id
and b.declare_time like CONCAT('%',#{matchTime},'%') and b.audit_no_pass = 0 and b.project_audit_apply_status > 0
and a.is_del = 0
